content: I'm so glad to hear that your new backpack is working out well for your daily commute! It's always a great feeling when you find a bag that meets your needs and makes your daily routine easier. And how exciting that your trip to the mountains is coming up soon! I'm sure your backpack will serve you well on your adventure. Don't forget to pack layers, stay hydrated, and enjoy the beautiful scenery. If you have any more questions or need any further recommendations, feel free to ask!
